item.title: Bulletin updated at 00:00 HKT 28/Mar/2019
item.author: Hong Kong Observatory
item.description:
General Situation:
A warm and humid maritime airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong today and tomorrow. Under the influence of an upper-air disturbance, there will be thundery showers over southern China in the latter part of this week. The northeast monsoon is expected to bring slightly cooler weather to Guangdong early next week. With the moderation of the monsoon midweek next week, temperatures will rise gradually over the coastal areas.

Date/Month: 28/03 (Thursday)
Wind: South to southeast force 3.
Weather: Coastal fog in the morning and at night. Sunny periods during the day.
Temp range: 22 - 27 C
R.H. range: 75 - 100 per Cent

Date/Month: 29/03 (Friday)
Wind: South to southeast force 3.
Weather: Mainly cloudy with a few showers. Coastal mist in the morning. More showers with isolated thunderstorms at night.
Temp range: 22 - 26 C
R.H. range: 75 - 95 per Cent

Date/Month: 30/03 (Saturday)
Wind: Light winds force 2. Becoming east force 4 later, occasionally force 5 offshore.
Weather: Mainly cloudy with a few showers. Isolated thunderstorms at first.
Temp range: 21 - 25 C
R.H. range: 75 - 95 per Cent

Date/Month: 31/03 (Sunday)
Wind: East to northeast force 4 to 5.
Weather: Cloudy with occasional rain.
Temp range: 19 - 23 C
R.H. range: 70 - 95 per Cent

Date/Month: 01/04 (Monday)
Wind: East to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore.
Weather: Mainly cloudy. One or two rain patches at first.
Temp range: 18 - 21 C
R.H. range: 70 - 90 per Cent

Date/Month: 02/04 (Tuesday)
Wind: East force 4, force 5 offshore.
Weather: Sunny intervals.
Temp range: 19 - 22 C
R.H. range: 70 - 90 per Cent

Date/Month: 03/04 (Wednesday)
Wind: East force 4.
Weather: Sunny periods.
Temp range: 20 - 24 C
R.H. range: 70 - 90 per Cent

Date/Month: 04/04 (Thursday)
Wind: East to southeast force 3 to 4.
Weather: Sunny periods. Coastal mist at night.
Temp range: 21 - 25 C
R.H. range: 75 - 95 per Cent

Date/Month: 05/04 (Friday)
Wind: South force 3.
Weather: Sunny periods. Coastal mist in the morning and at night.
Temp range: 22 - 26 C
R.H. range: 75 - 95 per Cent

Sea surface temperature at 2 P.M. 27/03/2019 at North Point was 22 degrees C.
Soil temperatures at 7 A.M. 27/03/2019 at Hong Kong Observatory :
0.5 M below surface was 23.2 degrees C
1.0 M below surface was 23.7 degrees C
